name: AUSD
description: AUSD is a digital dollar minted 1:1 with USD fiat. AUSD may be used, kept, or exchanged online wherever parties are willing to accept AUSD. AUSD is 100% backed by Agora’s Reserves, which means traditional currency and cash equivalents, such as short-term U.S. Treasury securities. Agora operates with top tier partners, including State Street for custody, Van Eck for fund management, and PwC for our reserve audit. AUSD operates on a open partnership model focused on builders and businesses. Agora pays businesses for providing services to Agora (AUSD), whether they are exchanges, fintech’s, payment providers, or apps.
